version_description:
Engineer's special pack is available for a limited time.
Various interface improvements.
Various bug fixes.

Engineer's special pack is available for a limited time.
Various interface improvements.
Various bug fixes.

Cats!
Fire up your engines, many cool things await you in the new version of the game:
- Save up to 3 machines! A bigger garage allows you to save up to 3 battle machines and switch between them freely.
- Customize your feline driver! Want a new pelt color, a viking hat or a fancy moustache? Choose different hats and colors to make your fluffy engineer look special!
- We also fixed some annoying bugs, sharpened saws and changed oil. Now you’re good to go!

Cats!
Fire up your engines, many cool things await you in the new version of the game:
- Save up to 3 machines! A bigger garage allows you to save up to 3 battle machines and switch between them freely.
- Customize your feline driver! Want a new pelt color, a viking hat or a fancy moustache? Choose different hats and colors to make your fluffy engineer look special!
- We also fixed some annoying bugs, sharpened saws and changed oil. Now you’re good to go!

Meow, everyone!
Don’t be distracted by the roar of engines and explosions, because we have new features for you:
- Gangs! The more the merrier! Join other players, create a unique gang, and get ready for more surprises!
- Recommendations! Find the gang that’s the best fit for you!
- Chat! Find new friends & share ideas with your gangmates!
- Costumes! Even more catomization! Make your cat look like stylish hipster, a dangerous biker or even a zombie!

Meow, everyone!

- Gangs! The more the merrier! Join other players, create a unique gang, and get ready for more surprises!
- Recommendations! Find the gang that’s the best fit for you!
- Chat! Find new friends & share ideas with your gangmates!
- Costumes! Even more catomization! Make your cat look like stylish hipster, a dangerous biker or even a zombie!

What’s up, cats?
Get ready to have your minds blown:
- New weapons! Get them and make your machines even more powerful and dangerous!
- Gang battles! Team up and fight together for unique prizes in this brand new game mode!
- Gang boxes! You’ll find awesome stuff in these new boxes! Fight with your gang mates to get more rewards!
- Gang rating! Whose gang is the best? Work with your friends and climb to the top of the leaderboard!

We have improved stability and fixed some bugs.
We have improved stability and fixed some bugs.

Join the Halloween Quest for big rewards and get yourself a new gadget - harpoon!

- Halloween quest and the new game mode! Shall the holiday begin! No tricks, only treats for everyone!
- New gadget — harpoon! Ready to test it first?
- Private gangs! Don't want anyone but your friends in the gang? Make it private!
- Gang fights improvements! The opponent in gang fights seems too hard? Find another!

Ultimate machines, updated competition and more in THE BIGGEST UPDATE EVER!

- Ultimate machines: They’re big and they’re yours forever, even after increasing prestige!
- New weapon and gadget: Discover the Flamethrower and Frost Sprinkler for ultimate machines.
- New competition: Use ultimate machines to participate in the updated leagues.
- More prestige levels: Now you can play up to level 20.
- Plus: in-game news, bug fixes and weapon rebalancing.

More: https://zepto.helpshift.com/a/cats/

The Ultimate Christmas machine, a new Global Leaderboard, and improved replay recording! This update will keep you warm!
- Santa’s ultimate machine! A laser bell, double rocket and Santa’s freezing gift await!
- A new Global Leaderboard! Be on top of a new rating system.
- An easier way to record and share video replays! Replays are recorded automatically. You can easily share them anywhere you want!

Is it a rock? 
Is it a car? 
It's a Golem Set! 

Hit and push your opponents back with a mighty weapon! And don't be afraid to flip your machine — this new gadget just won't allow for it. And so won't the new type of wheels with tons of traction. 
Try it out now!

Hot Wheels are back! And this time, cooler than ever, with the amazing Monster Trucks!

- HOT WHEELS CARS: you'll get a chance to collect last year's cars, but Tiger Shark and 5 Alarm will blow your mind!
- FURRY ROAD: defeat the Championship opponents and move further down the Road to obtain insane prizes!
- HOT WHEELS CHALLENGES: legendary racer Evil Catnievel invites you to take part in special All-Stars and Grand-Prix events!

C.A.T.S. continues its world tour. It's time to say "adeus, Brasil" and "hello again, USA!"
- END OF CITY KINGS SEASON: another city season is coming to an end. Collect your rewards and get ready for the next battle!
- NEW SECRET PART: an awesome, new and very powerful item for normal machines will be revealed soon. Keep playing to find out more!
- UNLOCK THE AMERICAN GEAR: Take part in the 4th of July All-Stars and fight to unlock a collection of 3 new powerful ultimate parts.

Cats! If you thought you'd seen it all, wait till you see what awaits you in this update!
- END OF CITY KINGS SEASON: Don't stop fighting in the City Kings as now wars will end based on gangs completing their current activity!
- GROOVY THRUST: Activate Groovy Thrust to get twice as many coins from boxes, or twice the fame in All-Stars for a week! Come and check it out now!
- MORE ULTIMATE PARTS: We have increased the variety and number of ultimate parts available in the ultimate boxes. Enjoy!

Join the 2nd anniversary celebration of C.A.T.S.! Plenty of surprises await you:
- ACCEPT THE SHOWDOWN CHALLENGE: Discover our time-limited Championship with its brand new rules! Choose your enemies and use the boosters to defeat them and unlock amazing rewards.
- DISCOVER THE BLACK MARKET: Reach Stage 15 to unlock the Black Market shop and find the best bargains!
- NEW SECRET PART: An awesome and very powerful soon-to-be-announced item to enhance normal machines. Keep playing to find out more!
SUBSCRIPTION. Subscribe to Premium Membership and get premium experience with CATS
By subscribing to CATS, you:
- Disable all forced Ads
- Unlock 10 locked parts immediately
- Get 80 gems for free every day
- Get x2 coins from boxes
Subscription cost is $4.99/$7.99/$9.99 for 1 week. If you choose to purchase Premium Membership Subscription Pack, your account will be charged upon confirmation of purchase after the free trial expires. Your subscription will auto-renew every week/month unless you turn it off 24-hours prior to the end of the current period.
You can turn off auto-renewal at any time from your game settings. No cancellation of the current subscription is allowed during an active subscription period. If you don’t choose to purchase subscription, you can simply continue using CATS for free.
Terms and Conditions:
https://www.zeptolab.com/terms

The Year of the Dog is coming to an end... Prepare to greet the Pig with us!
- LUNAR NEW YEAR: Fireworks, lanterns, lion masks, and other surprises are waiting for you in the game!
- THE PIGGY SET: Increase your machine’s power with a special gadget from a new ultimate set!
- ALL-STARS TOURNAMENT: Take part in a warm-up event and craft the Piggy set, and then join the great Lunar New Year tournament to unlock a very special reward!

Faster championship, daily event boosters and spring decorations! Happy Easter!

- FASTER CHAMPIONSHIP! Pass through the championship stages twice as fast!
- FREE DAILY BOOSTER! Boxes from your sponsors now help you get Ultimate parts faster!
- NOTIFICATIONS FOR KINGS OF THE CITY! You’ll be warned about all events in the city war and can react to them instantly!
- UI improvements and bug fixes.

Prepare to celebrate the Chinese New Year, try the Dragon Ultimate Machine and look out for more prestige levels! The fun must go on!

- CHINESE NEW YEAR! Fireworks, lanterns, lion masks and other Lunar New Year surprises await you in the game!
- DRAGON MORTAR! A new ultimate weapon! Bombard your enemies with deadly grenades!
- NEW PRESTIGE LEVELS! Fight your way up through 30 prestige levels!
- UI improvements and bug fixes.

Get ready to celebrate one of the most colorful festivities of the year: the Brazilian Carnival!
- AU REVOIR, PURRIS: Another City Kings season is coming to an end. Say goodbye to the City of Lights and don't forget to collect your reward!
- NEW CITY: Discover Meow de Janeiro! New locations are waiting to be conquered. Will your team succeed?
- WELCOME TO THE CATSNIVAL: Fight in the special All-Stars competition to obtain some of the most powerful Ultimate Parts!

Welcome to the streets of Mew York. Someone has to rule this place... Why not your gang‎?
- KINGS OF THE CITY‎: Fight against real gangs from around the globe to conquer the city in this NEW cooperative game mode.
- ULTIMATE TOOLBOXES‎: Give your ultimate machines a temporary boost with these powerful kits‎!
- ULTIMATE BOOSTER‎: Stymied in a league‎? Stuck on ultimate upgrades‎? Unlock this powerful bonus and speed up your progress.
- AND MUCH MORE‎: New ultimate parts, UI improvements and bug fixes.

A new score system, Healing, and Gang Call have come to Kings of the City! Who’s ready to conquer Mew York?

- NEW SCORE SYSTEM: Much easier and fairer for everyone!
- HEALING: Tired of getting destroyed by your enemies? Now you can restore your machine and keep fighting for the City!
- GANG CALL: Send a notification to your whole Gang to let them know you need them!
- UI fixes, rebalanced matchmaking for Kings of the City, time-based Ultimate Toolboxes, notifications, and much more!

- HEALING: Tired of getting destroyed by your enemies? Now you can restore your machine and keep fighting for the City!
- GANG CALL: Send a notification to your whole Gang to let them know you need them!
- UI fixes, rebalanced matchmaking for Kings of the City, time-based Ultimate Toolboxes, notifications, and much more!

We have improved stability and fixed some bugs.

Welcome to the new competition that will put your battle skills to the test!
- ALL STARS EVENT: Fight with 0 gravity, on different terrains or with fire burning the ground. Prove you are the Ultimate Turbo Star!

- And more: ability to disable system messages in gang chat, UI improvements and bug fixing.

It’s Hot Wheels’ 50th anniversary and we want to celebrate it by shifting C.A.T.S. to a fun new gear! Get ready for the Hot Wheels Challenge!
- 3 HOT WHEELS CARS: Unlock all the new parts to create unique and powerful machines.
- FURRY ROAD: Defeat the Championship opponents and move further down the Road to obtain insane prizes!
- HOT WHEELS CHALLENGES: Want to level up your Hot Wheels sets? Participate in the All-Stars events! Prove you are a true champion and you’ll be rewarded accordingly.

The ApoCATlypse has begun! Get prepared with the new post-apocalyptic set:

- ApoCATlypse Bus: a large, robust vehicle. Plenty of energy to arrive on time to school.
- Stop Sign Gadget: everybody stops for the stop sign, especially ranged weapons.
- Basketball Cannon: shoots basketballs that will remain on the arena to absorb some damage.
- Electrified Barbed Wire: stuns enemy machines and all of their parts for some time.
- Tank Tracks: slow, but have increased force.

It's C.A.T.S. 3rd anniversary, but Uncle Tony is missing! We’ve been looking for him everywhere, and now we need your help.

SPECIAL EVENTS MONTH: Participate in All Stars, Grand Prix and other competitions while searching for Uncle Tony.
NEW EVENT - THE SCRAP RUN: Play the Championship to receive bolts. Spend them in the Junkyard in exchange for chests full of spare parts.
UNIQUE REWARDS: Once the event is over, the Junkyard master will reward you with brand new parts.

- The Skull Goblet and Nanobots station healing logic has been reworked
- Hearth and Bearfall have been re-balanced
- Bearfall got a new skin
- We've improved the matchmaking algorithm, making it smoother
- And many more technical fixes have been added to make the game better for you!
